__comment_2: UI options (camera preview, mesh, buttons) are NOT controlled here anymore.

websocket.__comment: Connection settings for PNGTubeRemix WebSocket server
websocket.__comment_host: IP address where PNGTubeRemix is running (usually 127.0.0.1 or localhost)
websocket.__comment_reconnect: How long to wait in seconds, before attempting to reconnect if the connection fails (Default = 5)

performance.__comment_camera: Camera device index (0 = default webcam, if 0 doesn't work, keep trying +1 each time)
performance.__comment_fps: Maximum tracking FPS (lower = less CPU usage // Default = 20)

smoothing.__comment: Smoothing values to reduce snappy movement
smoothing.__comment_smoothing: 0.0 = no smoothing, 0.9 = very smooth (Default = 0.75) | Higher values = smoother but slower response.

deadzone.__comment: Small movements under these values will be ignored to prevent jitter

sprites.__comment: Each entry below represents ONE sprite/action in PNGTubeRemix
sprites.__comment_2: You can duplicate these blocks to add as many sprites as you want

DoodyHead.__comment_tracker: What MediaPipe tracker to use: HEAD (others later: EYE, MOUTH, BROW, IRIS)

conditions.__comment: Conditions that must be met to trigger the following output
conditions.__comment_x: Trigger when head X movement is between -5 and 5
conditions.__comment_note: realistically you're not gonna meet all of these conditions at the same time, to trigger the output below. so only add conditions that are realistic.

output.__comment: Values that will be sent to PNGTubeRemix when conditions are met

Head_but_better_idk_this_is_just_an_exam.__comment: Example of a second sprite triggered only when head tilts right
